    • Constructor Detail

      • Engine

        public Engine()
        This constructor for the engine is used for testing purposes. It can create a scalable board and gives the choice of starting the game with debug mode on or off.

      • Engine

        public Engine(int i)
        This constructor for the engine is used to create the board that is ready for actual gameplay. The board is a predefined size and debug mode is off.

    • Method Detail

        This engine simulates the rolling of a die for randomization.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of sides the die has
        Returns:
        The number that was rolled
